participant_1.background:

i don t drive.

i like to read.
i like to ski.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How are you?
I am doing well, thank you! I just graduated college with my bachelors degree in education!
That is wonderful! Congratulations! I am sure you will do great things in your career!
Thank you! I am excited to start my new job as a teacher!
That is great! I am sure you will be a great teacher!
Thank you! I am looking forward to it!
What are you most excited about in your new job?
I am most excited about working with students and helping them learn!
That is great! I am sure you will do a wonderful job!
Thank you! I am excited to get started!
